name: Please Stay Until Midnight
description:
After avoiding it for a long time you promised to go to your friends party and not just be on the side ignoring everyone.

All the noise and interaction will get overwhelming quickly so you need to manage yourself to avoid this. Give people attention so they don’t think you are ignoring them while getting the space you need to be able to deal with all of this.

INSTALLATION

- Unzip the file you have downloaded

- Run the “please stay until midnight” file.

NOTE: Due to the app/program not being certified you might get warnings on Windows and Mac. 

HOW TO PLAY

- WASD keys to move

- Use the mouse to control the camera
